editorialNotes.tagline: In your world, you are the hero

editorialNotes.standard: Few villains are as unsettling as this stealth game's creepy neighbor, who relentlessly pursues you through his increasingly bizarre house.

Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.standard: Elemental magic rules the land of Teyvat in the remarkable Genshin Impactâ€”and as a powerful Traveler, you put this power to good use. Vibrant visual effects transform elemental blasts of fire, ice, and lightning into jaw-dropping spectacles. But itâ€™s not just a looker: Genshin Impactâ€™s beautiful open world is filled with thrilling quests and fascinating secrets. Climb mountains, cook meals, and soar through the skies as you search for your lost siblingâ€”or simply get lost in Teyvat and see what happens.
editorialNotes.short: Explore a new land, and meet amazing new characters.

editorialNotes.standard: Rec Room is a sprawling, vibrant universe of wildly different multiplayer experiences, which makes it easy to find whatever weâ€™re in the mood for. We can play paintball, slay monsters in dungeons, or simply hang out with friends on a moonlit island beachâ€”and so much more. But itâ€™s not all about playing: Rec Room lets us make things too. With intuitive tools for creating and sharing our own experiences, Rec Room provides a fantastic way to turn imagination into digital reality.

It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.
Saving the world? Might as well look good doing it! Put together stylish outfits and glide through this cozy open-world RPG.

editorialNotes.standard: Weâ€™ll be fossilized before we get through all the content packed into this impressive mobile version of the dino-taming survival favorite.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabamâ€™s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick, and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters, and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but youâ€™ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponentsâ€”and progressing through treacherous story quests.

editorialNotes.tagline: Evolve your dinos in lush landscapes
editorialNotes.standard: This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster movie. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream parkâ€™s high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaursâ€™ mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

Star Wars and toys go together like Wookiees and smugglers, but rarely so well as they do in these classic LEGO adventures. Theyâ€™re all hereâ€”the most beloved characters, settings, and vehicles from the first six films, lovingly translated into plastic bricks for a wacky reenactment of George Lucasâ€™s epic space odyssey. Thanks to instantly accessible controls and hours of action-packed gameplay, fans of all ages can jump in and relive their favorite scenes.

name: Parkour World: Run and Jump Up

editorialNotes.standard: Deciphering this game is no easy taskâ€”it feels like a metaphor. Is it a commentary on the fragile nature of trust and human connection? A scathing critique of our blind adherence to authority? Or is it just really weird? Regardless, INSIDE is an incredible journey with increasingly bizarre encounters that mix action with clever puzzle designs. The game isnâ€™t meant to be entirely understood. Itâ€™s meant to be experienced.

editorialNotes.standard: The fragility and fear of growing up. The terror of leaping into the unknown. Life is Strange tackles tough issues in a remarkable way, merging the superpowered and surreal with characters that feel authentic. Youâ€™re drawn into the adventure through gorgeous visuals. Sharp writing, excellent voice acting, and a compelling story make solving Life is Strangeâ€™s mysteries feel essential.
In this gruesome 2D platformer, youâ€™re the monster! Grow your creepy blob by breaking through doors and snacking on evil scientists.

editorialNotes.standard: Liberty City Stories shows off one of gamingâ€™s most memorable worlds while taking you on an action-packed tour of a criminal underworld. Stealing cars, evading cops, and racing through streets littered with obstacles is an absolute blast. Gaining notoriety while amassing new cars and weapons is as addictive as ever, and the franchiseâ€™s familiar dark humor had us laughing out loud. Rockstar's enormous game offers a wonderful sandbox filled with chaos and silliness, and you wonâ€™t want to leave it.
